00042 class CTag
00043 {
00044 public:
00045     CTag(const CTag& rTag);
00046     CTag(const CFileDataIO& data, bool bOptUTF8);
00047     virtual ~CTag();
00048     CTag& operator=(const CTag&);
00049 
00050     uint8 GetType() const       { return m_uType; }
00051     uint8 GetNameID() const     { return m_uName; }
00052     const wxString& GetName() const { return m_Name; }
00053     
00054     bool IsStr() const      { return m_uType == TAGTYPE_STRING; }
00055     bool IsInt() const      { return 
00056         (m_uType == TAGTYPE_UINT64) ||
00057         (m_uType == TAGTYPE_UINT32) ||
00058         (m_uType == TAGTYPE_UINT16) ||
00059         (m_uType == TAGTYPE_UINT8); }
00060     bool IsFloat() const        { return m_uType == TAGTYPE_FLOAT32; }
00061     bool IsHash() const     { return m_uType == TAGTYPE_HASH16; }
00062     bool IsBlob() const     { return m_uType == TAGTYPE_BLOB; }
00063     bool IsBsob() const     { return m_uType == TAGTYPE_BSOB; }
00064     
00065     uint64 GetInt() const;
00066     
00067     const wxString& GetStr() const;
00068     
00069     float GetFloat() const;
00070     
00071     const CMD4Hash& GetHash() const;
00072     
00073     const byte* GetBlob() const;
00074     uint32 GetBlobSize() const;
00075     
00076     const byte* GetBsob() const;
00077     uint32 GetBsobSize() const;
00078     
00079     CTag* CloneTag()        { return new CTag(*this); }
00080     
00081     bool WriteTagToFile(CFileDataIO* file,
00082         EUtf8Str eStrEncode = utf8strNone,
00083         bool restrictive = true) const;         // old eD2K tags
00084     bool WriteNewEd2kTag(CFileDataIO* file,
00085         EUtf8Str eStrEncode = utf8strNone) const;   // new eD2K tags
00086     
00087     wxString GetFullInfo() const;
00088 
00089 protected:
00090     CTag(const wxString& Name);
00091     CTag(uint8 uName);
00092 
00093     uint8   m_uType;
00094     union {
00095         CMD4Hash*   m_hashVal;
00096         wxString*   m_pstrVal;
00097         uint64      m_uVal;
00098         float       m_fVal;
00099         unsigned char*  m_pData;
00100     };
00101 
00102     uint32      m_nSize;
00103     
00104 private:
00105     uint8       m_uName;
00106     wxString    m_Name;
00107     
00108 };

00110 typedef std::list<CTag*> TagPtrList;

00112 class CTagIntSized : public CTag
00113 {
00114 public:
00115     CTagIntSized(const wxString& name, uint64 value, uint8 bitsize)
00116         : CTag(name) {
00117             Init(value, bitsize);
00118         }
00119 
00120     CTagIntSized(uint8 name, uint64 value, uint8 bitsize)
00121         : CTag(name) {
00122             Init(value, bitsize);           
00123         }
00124         
00125 protected:
00126     CTagIntSized(const wxString& name) : CTag(name) {}
00127     CTagIntSized(uint8 name) : CTag(name) {}
00128 
00129     void Init(uint64 value, uint8 bitsize) {
00130             switch (bitsize) {
00131                 case 64:
00132                     wxASSERT(value <= ULONGLONG(0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF)); 
00133                     m_uVal = value;
00134                     m_uType = TAGTYPE_UINT64;
00135                     break;
00136                 case 32:
00137                     wxASSERT(value <= 0xFFFFFFFF); 
00138                     m_uVal = value;
00139                     m_uType = TAGTYPE_UINT32;
00140                     break;
00141                 case 16:
00142                     wxASSERT(value <= 0xFFFF); 
00143                     m_uVal = value;
00144                     m_uType = TAGTYPE_UINT16;
00145                     break;
00146                 case 8:
00147                     wxASSERT(value <= 0xFF); 
00148                     m_uVal = value;
00149                     m_uType = TAGTYPE_UINT8;
00150                     break;
00151                 default:
00152                     throw wxString(wxT("Invalid bitsize on int tag"));
00153             }
00154     }
00155 };
00156 
00157 class CTagVarInt : public CTagIntSized
00158 {
00159 public:
00160     CTagVarInt(const wxString& name, uint64 value, uint8 forced_bits = 0)
00161         : CTagIntSized(name) {
00162             SizedInit(value, forced_bits);
00163         }
00164     CTagVarInt(uint8 name, uint64 value, uint8 forced_bits = 0)
00165         : CTagIntSized(name) {
00166             SizedInit(value, forced_bits);
00167         }
00168 private:
00169     void SizedInit(uint64 value, uint8 forced_bits) {
00170         if (forced_bits) {
00171             // The bitsize was forced.
00172             Init(value,forced_bits);
00173         } else { 
00174             m_uVal = value;
00175             if (value <= 0xFF) {
00176                 m_uType = TAGTYPE_UINT8;
00177             } else if (value <= 0xFFFF) {
00178                 m_uType = TAGTYPE_UINT16;
00179             } else if (value <= 0xFFFFFFFF) {
00180                 m_uType = TAGTYPE_UINT32;
00181             } else {
00182                 m_uType = TAGTYPE_UINT64;
00183             }
00184         }       
00185     }
00186 };
00187

00268 class CTagBsob : public CTag
00269 {
00270 public:
00271     CTagBsob(const wxString& name, const byte* value, uint8 nSize)
00272         : CTag(name)
00273     {
00274         m_uType = TAGTYPE_BSOB;
00275         m_pData = new byte[nSize];
00276         memcpy(m_pData, value, nSize);
00277         m_nSize = nSize;
00278     }
00279 };

00281 class CTagBlob : public CTag
00282 {
00283 public:
00284     CTagBlob(const wxString& name, const byte* value, uint8 nSize)
00285         : CTag(name)
00286     {
00287         m_uType = TAGTYPE_BLOB;
00288         m_pData = new byte[nSize];
00289         memcpy(m_pData, value, nSize);
00290         m_nSize = nSize;
00291     }
00292 };
